entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
